{{Wired embedded system |brand=Iomega |model=StorCenter |revision=ix4-300d |asin=B009O7Z226,B009O7Z21C |is_manuf=No |est_release_date=December 2012 |type=NAS |pwr_v=19 |pwr_amp=4.74 |pwr_conn=barrel plug |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=MV78230 |cpu1_cspeed=1.3 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9K8G08U0E-SCB0 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CB128M16FP-DI |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0, SATA |expansion_usb_num=3 |expansion_sata_num=4 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1), |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1318 |eth_chip3_brand=Marvell |eth_chip3_model=88E1318 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=SATA Controller;Marvell;88SX7042;;1; ,,, USB 3.0 Controller;NEC;D720200F1;;1;,,, CMOS Real Time Clock;NXP;PCF8563;;1;,,, Remote Thermal Monitor and Fan Control;ON Semiconductor;ADT7473;;1;,,, Dual PWM Step Down Controller w/ Low Power LDO, RTC Regulator;Maxim;MAX17020;;1;,,, I2C 2-Wire 64K EEPROM;TurboIC;24C64F;;1;,,, Dual Operational Amplifier;Texas Instruments;LM358;;1;,,, 30V P-Channel MOSFET;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4407A;;2;,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4468;;3;,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4712;;2;,,, 30V Dual N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4818B;;1;,,, 30V N-Channel AphaMOS;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4354;;4;,,, P-Channel Logic Level Enhancement MOSFET;Niko Semiconductor;P2003EVG;;1;,,, Low Drop Adjustable Voltage Regulator;Unisonic;LD1117AG;;2;,,, 3A Ultra Low Dropout Linear Regulator;ANPEC;APL5930;;3;,,, 3A, 12V Synchronous Rectified Buck Converter;ANPEC;APW7145;;1;,,, 8-bit serial-in, parallel-out shift register;NXP;74HC164D;;1;,,, Hex Buffer with Open Drain Output;Texas Instruments;SN74LV07A;;1;,,, Dual Positive-Edge-Triggered D-Type Flip-Flop;Texas Instruments;SN74AHC74;;1;,,, |flags=RTC w/ battery backup, LCD display, |stock_boot=U-Boot; |stock_os=Linux; |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |oui_eth=00:D0:B8 }} {{TagLine|Iomega StorCenter (Lenovo EMC) Network Storage 4 Bay}} :[http://portal.iomegacloud.com/px4300d.php?user_lang=en Product page] {{â€¢}} [http://download.lenovo.com/lenovoemc/na/en/app/platform/p/1031%2c1186.html Support page]
===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/nas/nas-reviews/32002-iomega-ix4-300d-storcenter-network-storage-reviewed Review on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://cheklab.ru/archives/4228 Review on '''ChekLab'''] (RU) *[https://www.channelpronetwork.com/news/lenovoemc-debuts-improved-ix4-400d-four-bay-nas-ces-and-weve-got-all-details PR on '''ChannelProNetwork'''] {{See also|Iomega StorCenter Pro ix4-300d}}
===Specifications=== *[[Iomega StorCenter ix4-300d]] - Network Storage 4-bay (35565) :Processor: [[Marvell]] MV78230 (Armada XP) @1.3GHz (Dual Core) :Memory: 512MB DDR3; Hard drives: 4x 1TB 3.5" (SATA II) :Ports: 1x GbE (RJ45), 1x USB 3.0, 2x USB 2.0 :LAN: [[Marvell]] 88E1318 (Alaska) GbE (10/100/1000) :SATA Controller: [[Marvell]] 88SX7042 :USB 3.0 Controller: NEC D720200F1
*[[Iomega StorCenter Pro ix4-300d]] - Network Storage 4-bay :4 bay hot-swap NAS from Lenovo (formerly Iomega) :Processor: [[Intel Atom]] D525 @1.8GHz (Quad Core) :Memory: 4GB DDR2; Hard drives: 4x 1TB (SATA II) :Ports: 2x GbE (RJ45), 1x USB 3.0, 2x USB 2.0
